name: MXBackgroundExitData
desc: An object representing counts for the different types of background app exits.

items.name: var cumulativeNormalAppExitCount: Int
items.desc: The number of times the app exited normally from the background.

items.name: var cumulativeAbnormalExitCount: Int
items.desc: The number of times the app exited abnormally from the background.

items.name: var cumulativeAppWatchdogExitCount: Int
items.desc: The number of times the system watchdog terminated the app from the background.

items.name: var cumulativeCPUResourceLimitExitCount: Int
items.desc: The number of times the system terminated the app from the background for using too much CPU time.

items.name: var cumulativeMemoryResourceLimitExitCount: Int
items.desc: The number of times the system terminated the app from the background for using too much memory.

items.name: var cumulativeMemoryPressureExitCount: Int
items.desc: The number of times the system terminated the app from the background to free up memory.

items.name: var cumulativeSuspendedWithLockedFileExitCount: Int
items.desc: The number of times the system terminated the app from the background while being suspended and having file locks.

items.name: var cumulativeBadAccessExitCount: Int
items.desc: The number of times the system terminated the app from the background for attempting an invalid memory access.

items.name: var cumulativeIllegalInstructionExitCount: Int
items.desc: The number of times the system terminated the app from the background for attempting to execute an illegal or undefined instruction.

items.name: var cumulativeBackgroundTaskAssertionTimeoutExitCount: Int
items.desc: The number of times the system terminated the app from the background for exceeding the allocated time for a background task.
